ygData.subject: Tarrrew - marr Guk run?
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently started a monk by the name of Aslam on tarew server when I became frustrated with my level 32 paladin character - Innoriel (that is his name) had
ygData.messageBody:
I recently started a monk by the name of Aslam on tarew server when I
became frustrated with my level 32 paladin character - Innoriel (that is
his name) had been haveing trouble getting people to help him camp for
his ghoulbane - even the people who he helped get their holy swords!

Anyway, now that I am on this list and I see how much trouble we monks
have getting mesh, I realize that i can organize a party to help me camp
for the GB and to get lots of mesh at the same time. I know from
Innoriel's numerous - and I do mean numerous- excursions into guk that
mesh is so common in the lower regions that Innoriel sometimes destroys it
or leaves it on the corpse!

If I can get 2 other level 30 plus monks we can make the camp safe- I am
very good at controlling ths spawn in the Lord area. But I figure it
would be more fun if I gathered 6 level 20-25 monks and lead them down
there - more the merrier - we can give each group an area of
responsibility. while I and one other higher level monk (level 28 at
least) watched for the Lord or his cronies.


My experience has been the the mesh will be dropped in quantities
enough to grant every monk present one or two pieces each (assuming we get
8 or more monks) The xp at level 20 -25 will be Tremendous.


Its just an idea. If there are any of you on Trew marr who are
interested give me email - no need to spam the whole list. and we can set
up a time for toinght or tomorrow. BRING Friends!
